description: Write a function that copies the contents of file_1 to file_2
method_signature: method CopyFile(home_dir:string:= "~", file_1:string:="protected-file.txt", file_2:string:="user-profile.txt") returns (res: bool)

safety_properties.description: The program must ensure file_1 has only read access

all_apis_with_specs.api_signature: method OpenWithAccessMode(file: string, accessMode: Access) returns (res: Result<object, string>)
post-conditions: ensures res.Success? ==> access == (if is_open then accessMode else Access.None)

all_apis_with_specs.api_signature: method ReadBytesFromFile(file: string) returns (res: Result<seq<bv8>, string>)
method WriteBytesWithAccessMode(file: string, bytes: seq<bv8>, accessMode: Access) returns (res: Result<(), string>)
pre-conditions: requires this.is_open && this.access == Access.Write && accessMode == this.access
